courses.title: Introduction to Classical Music
courses.description: Discover the foundations of classical music, including its history, major composers, and key works that have shaped the genre.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation for Beginners
courses.description: Learn the art of jazz improvisation, including scales, chord progressions, and improvisational techniques for beginners.

courses.title: Mastering the Violin
courses.description: An advanced course for violinists looking to refine their technique, improve their sound, and master complex pieces.

courses.title: Music Production with Ableton Live
courses.description: Explore the tools and techniques needed to produce professional-level music using Ableton Live, from recording to mixing and mastering.

courses.title: Exploring World Music
courses.description: Journey through the diverse sounds and rhythms of world music, learning about traditional and contemporary music from different cultures.

courses.title: Electronic Music Composition
courses.description: Learn to compose, arrange, and produce electronic music, covering the essentials from sound design to sequencing.
